name: hows-my-driving-dc
description: Starter Kit for running Headless-Chrome by Puppeteer on AWS Lambda

scripts.package: npm run package-prepare && cp chrome/headless_shell.tar.gz dist && cp eng.traineddata dist && cd dist && zip -rq ../package.zip .
scripts.package-nochrome: npm run package-prepare && cd dist && zip -rq ../package.zip .
scripts.package-prepare: npm run lint && npm run babel && cp -r package.json dist && cd dist && PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=1 npm install --production
scripts.babel: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && babel src --out-dir dist
scripts.local: npm run babel && cp eng.traineddata dist && cp -r node_modules dist && node dist/local.js
scripts.lint: eslint src && prettier -l src/**/*.js || (echo need formatting ; exit 1)
